level.heading: REIMBURSEMENT (§ 29-9110) Medicaid reimbursement shall be available for the seven (7) categories ofervices described under this chapter. ASARS shall be reimbursed according to aee schedule rate for each service included in an approved treatment plan. Separate reimbursement rates shall be established for services eligible to beendered in community-based, group, and family settings. The fee schedule shall be published on the DHCF’s website atww.dc-medicaid.com.
